header.title: Top Five
header.description: Will show the last five topics that had a recent post, the top five most active users and the top five latest registered users
header.author-notes: The mod takes advantage of caching the top five newest users and top five most active/greatest amount of posts users. When a user is added, deleted or changed in default group the cache will purge itself to reflect the new change.

changelog.change: Fixed mysqli error and added caching in includes top_five. MODX 1.2.2
SQL change for latest posts and reduced user posts count cache to 5 minutes
Fixed bug in topic query and language comments in lang file
Corrected slow query being complained about by some hosts
purge the cache on adding/deleting or changing a users default group or deleting a user
